definition: a chamber used for baking, heating, or drying
a piece of cooking equipment that is used for baking or roasting food
a heated chamber (as in a stove) for baking, heating, or drying
in: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.

definition: a large piece of equipment in a kitchen that you heat, usually with electricity or gas, to cook food in. An oven often has a grill in it
in: Return the dish to the oven to heat through before serving.
a hot/moderate/low oven
Bake for 25 minutes, then reduce the oven temperature.
preheat an oven: Preheat the oven to 220ºC, Gas mark 7.
like an oven

a microwave oven
a cool/medium/hot oven
